Translations.Text: Se gxi est por di grace vi His mercy kelk da them misled vi! Ili nur mislead ili neniam harm vi en des malplej DI SEND down VI scripture wisdom LI INSTRU VI ki VI NENIAM KON! Ja di blessings vi est great
tie est nothing bon their privat konferenc escept por those advokat charity righteous works far pac among des popol. Anyone does this en response al di teachings ni grant him great recompense
As por him opposes messenger guidance pint him sekv believers' voj ni direct him direction li chosen commit him al Infer; ki miserable destiny
